channel.title: Is there a way to delete (really) a dashboard or a query with the API?
channel.description:
Hello everybody,
I am using redash, and redash-toolbelt. However, the API only allow to archive a dashboard and we cannot force the delete.
This feature has some consequences with the URL of the dashboard which is still blocked.
Is there a way with the API to really remove the dashboard ?
